incidents.name: Messaging Insights Degradation

incident_updates.body: Messaging Insights bookmarks resolution was degraded from 19:34 UTC to 21:47 UTC on 09/17/2025. During this period, customers may have experienced issues with their bookmarked queries not resolving in the UI and would have been redirected to the Overview Tab. The issue has now been resolved.

Messaging Insights bookmarks resolution was degraded from 19:34 UTC to 21:47 UTC on 09/17/2025. During this period, customers may have experienced issues with their bookmarked queries not resolving in the UI and would have been redirected to the Overview Tab. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Messaging Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues With Unexpected Rejections of Regulatory Compliance Bundles for France and Non-Compliance Alert for Germany

incident_updates.body:
Purchasing of International Long Codes was impacted for France for 22 hrs 38 minutes between 11 September 11:40 AM PDT and 12 September 10:18 AM Pacific Time. During this period customers would have experienced issues buying new phone numbers for France - Local, National and Tollfree due to rejection of approved regulatory compliance bundles. The issue has now been resolved.

There was additional impact for German customers having Mobile long codes associated with Approved German Mobile RC bundles showing an alert Some of your bundles are expiring soon and needs updating which was a false alarm. There was no impact to functionality. This alert has now been removed.

incidents.name: Incorrect Error Code Delivered to Customers in Certain Cases for Orchestrated RCS Messages

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting incorrect error codes being delivered to customers in certain cases for orchestrated RCS Messages has been resolved and the service is now functioning normally.

We continue to see recovery for the issue with incorrect error code being delivered to customers in certain cases for orchestrated RCS Messages. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate on the issue with incorrect error code being delivered to customers in certain cases for orchestrated RCS Messages. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate on the issue with incorrect error code being delivered to customers in certain cases for orchestrated RCS Messages. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with incorrect error code being delivered to customers in certain cases for orchestrated RCS Messages. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Inbound WhatsApp Messages Not Arriving for a Subset of Customers

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting inbound delivery of WhatsApp messages has been resolved and is operating normally at this time.

We continue to see recovery for the issue affecting inbound delivery of WhatsApp messages. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our Engineers have identified an issue affecting inbound delivery of WhatsApp messages and are working with Meta to deploy a fix. Well provide the next update within 2 hours, or sooner if more information becomes available.

Our engineers are currently investigating an issue where inbound WhatsApp messages are not arriving. Our Engineers are working to identify the cause of this issue, and expect to provide another update in 1 hour, or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with WhatsApp. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the  lookup reassigned number package issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue where the lookup reassigned number package is having a significant drop in success rate. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with WhatsApp Messages

incident_updates.body: Between 09/10 at 8:00 PM PDT and 09/11 02:03 PM PDT customers may have experienced message delivery issues on WhatsApp.  This was caused by a vendor outage as part of "WhatsApp Account Ownership Is Moving to You" update that was shared previously by Twilio. This is since resolved and confirmed all systems are operational.

Our engineers are currently investigating reports of undelivered inbound WhatsApp messages on 09/11/2025. During this period, customers may have experienced not receiving inbound responses from their end-users. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery when sending messages to the Orange Network in Cameroon. This incident has been resolved.
